title: PAC-MAN MUSEUM Plus
description:
PAC-MAN MUSEUM+ includes 14 titles from the legendary PAC-MAN series Play a variety of classic and nostalgic PAC-MAN games across many genres Touken Ranbu Warriors
Play all 14 legendary titles like the classic PAC-MAN and PAC-LAND, as well as the newly included PAC-IN-TIME and PAC-MAN 256. Whether you love the original PAC-MANâ€™s side-scrolling action or the puzzle genre, this collection has something for everyone Includes 5 titles that can be played with friends and family in local multiplayer mode! There are even games for two players to take turns, so everyone gets to enjoy PAC-MAN together Collect items every time you play, and customize your very own arcade with them

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i3-2125 or AMD FX-4350
system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti, 1 GB or AMD Radeon HD 5770, 1 GB
